rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with Scandinavian design elements, incorporating minimalist decor and neutral colors. Provides seamless transition to the living spaces.
rooms.location: North-East corner (Vastu favorable for positive energy)

rooms.description: Open space with large windows and natural light, featuring Scandinavian furniture and clean lines. Integrated with a dining area.
A functional space for meals, designed with a modern Scandinavian aesthetic and efficient lighting.
Spacious bedroom with ample storage and a walk-in closet. Positioned in the North-West corner for peaceful energy, following Vastu principles.
A comfortable bedroom designed with Scandinavian minimalism. Suitable for children or guests, ensuring privacy.
Additional bedroom adhering to minimalist Scandinavian design; ideal for extended family or visitors.
rooms.location: Adjacent area near the servant quarters

rooms.description: Continuing the Scandinavian aesthetic, this bedroom offers modern comfort with storage solutions.
A functional and versatile space, blending Scandinavian design elements with efficient use of area.
The final bedroom on the ground floor, designed for a serene environment in line with Scandinavian minimalism.
A compact yet comfortable living space for servants, designed with functional Scandinavian interiors and essential amenities.
A modern, well-equipped gym space featuring Scandinavian design with clean lines and efficient use of the area.
rooms.location: Adjacent to the servant quarters or integrated into a common utility area

rooms.description: A functional, contemporary kitchen with Scandinavian design elements. Integrated with dining space for seamless workflow.
A small storage and utility area essential for supporting the main kitchen operations.

openings.description: A large, welcoming entrance door designed with Scandinavian style and durability.
Large windows placed for optimal natural light, enhancing the Vastu principle of energy flow.
Doors between rooms ensuring privacy while maintaining an open Scandinavian design feel.

vastu_note: The layout is designed with Vastu principles in mind, placing key elements like the master bedroom and entrance hall in favorable directions (north-east for positive energy). Scandinavian simplicity complements this design by ensuring open spaces and minimalistic decor throughout.
